The claim made in the ad was that: 300,000 health plans were canceled" in Florida due to the federal health care law.
The ad presented a front page article fr: Augustine Record as evidence of the claim.
Florida Blue: the insurance provider mentioned in the article, did send letters to about 300,000 members explaining that some plans would be closed due to the Affordable Care Act's requirement for essential benefits.
However: it was clarified that only 40,000 letters were actually mailed to members with effective dates of January 1, 2014, and subsequent notices were sent stating that their existing plans would remain active and unchanged through 2014.
